reviewText: tyler Perry continues to amaze me with his plays and the messages they bring, this was a good one to be watched by the entire family.

This was a good play and it was funny. Patrice Lovely delivered as usual and she just cracks me up. She reminds me so much of my grandmother. The play had a good story line of a maid who lives with her family, but is working for the upper class while struggling to keep her family and home together.
Thought this would be even better with all the success thus far but No. Sorry, but that is my opinion. Aside from actors who have worked with Perry and are great, nothing about this play moved me.

I like anything dealing with Mr. Perry,he is such an inspiration to me,Mr. Perry knows an follow and listen to the word of GOD,Because only God could bring him out of his troubled life,and just listening and watching his movies,plays I have learned a lot,and I thank God for Blessing me and my family,THANKS MR.T.P.

Like many, many, many, maybe millions of people, I like Tyler Perry.  He makes plays and movies that makes me laugh and when people in this world are doing so much to one another, it is NICE to take my sees off of the world and watch a play or movie that Mr. Perry has made that makes me laugh.  But do not get me wrong I do not like ALL his movies or PLAYS, but the plays that makes me laugh and teaches some very well needed lessons, I watch over and over.  I hope and pray someone will tell Mr. Perry to remember that people need to laugh and not be focus on what is happening in this world that God created for the people he made, and I know it is hurting God's heart that they are doing BAD things.  I have added this dvd to my other Tyler Perry collections of dvd's, I now have ten (10).  My favorite is "why did I get married, the orginial play.  I did not like the "second  why did I get married. Maybe one day he will make a play about the Bible, I think God laughs because I beleive he is laughing at the devil because, He sees that the devil is going to lose and Jesus is going Win.  God Bless You, Amazon.
Love, Georgia

I really like this play, between "Miss Hattie" & Palmer Williams there was more comedy deliverance than you could shake a stick at;  Tyler Perry definitely knows how to pass on a good message without preaching to you. And I like Tyler's plays more than the movies because the singing is always so well done; can't break out in songs on the big screen, doesn't work for most audiences.

This play will make you laugh and cry but most of all it will make you THINK about LIFE.

Don't compare this to the television series.  Patricia Lovejoy and William Palmer jr. are hilarious and their chemistry flows over to "Love Thy Neighbor".  This play shows the struggles of the poor, working for the rich.  Self worth and faithfulness.
What can I say about Tyler Perry plays. it 's so hilarious. You laugh, you cry, you laugh again.

Patrice Lovely is awesome.  I will be watching every play that she is in.  It was funny and the message was inspiring.

This play is my second favorite. I love all the songs in this play. What I love about Tyler Perry's plays is that the inspirational songs help remind me that my belief in God is real. Falling Apart is my favorite song. Tony Hightower sang and made that song what it is.
Great play!! I love all of Tyler Perry's movies and plays!  They always have a message in them!! Great Job, Mr. Perry!!!
This was funny, but not as good as I was expecting. The characters played their roles good but the tv series is better.
Hattie is my all time favorite I have a friend that is just like Hattie  and I just love her and that crazy Floyd he's my love from other shows..Any of the Tyler Perry shows or plays are all good.

I love this play.  If you haven't seen Hattie ack, she is a very good and funny actor.  You will enjoy the laughter but I must say some of the actors script did not flow as natural as Hattie. I can watch it anytime and still enjoy it.
it was ok but wasn't as funny as his others movies. maybe if tyler perrys character was in it i would have enjoyed it more

I ordered this dvd for my mom. She loves these moves and plays. The dvd was fine. the seller was fast. I would recommend if this is the kinda thing you find funny. it's good clean comedy for what it is. No complaints overall.

This was alright.  The songs were great.  Palmer Williams' character's humor is hilarious.  As always Mr. Perry always brings the message through.  But there were more innuendos than I thought were necessary.  I would equate the play's rating to about a "R" just for the innuendos.  Otherwise good unpredictable outcome and resolution.
It's not a boring play, you can certainly tell they enjoy what they do . They will make you laugh and think . No foul language and I appreciate that .

Alexis'role was a bit loose but too sweet.  The wife was sweet but not "revengeful" enough towards Alexis.  Loved Hattie, especially the shouting scene.  Hattie was the most realistic character.  I really should have this three stars.
Love Tyler Perry!  I have seen every play, movie and television show Tyler has produced.  He is the greatest!  Waiting for the next production anxiously!
I Enjoyed this Play by Tyler Perry It shares real left problems and help you to deal with them. I LOVE THIS PLAY
The songs in this play are wonderful and heart-warming.  I find myself replaying the songs when in other plays I have fast forwarded past the songs!

I love absolutely love all if Tyler Perry's movies. OMG. They are hilarious funny and every one of them teaches a lesson.
This I must say is a great play. I think I watch it for 3 nights straight. He always has a powerful message in his plays.
One of my many favorites. I watched it not too long after the DVD came out. I adore the majority of Tyler Perry's plays. This is one I will be buying soon.
Look if you don't know Tyler Perry you should get to know his work!  Amazing and great because he brings Christ into real people.

This was a very funny film. It addressed the issues of adultery, childrearing and extended families. This is different from the tv show. I love the strong father in the film. The butler and the grandmother, who appear on the DVD cover were very funny. The songs were very good. Highly recommended.
sOOOOO funny!!!  I laughed til I cried. I collect the plays and the movies.  when I need a good laugh, i watch a funny play or movie!

Quite different from the tv show..this is about a family struggling financially and parents losing their jobs.

Its entertaining and worth watching.  Good singing....OH...IT A PLAY.  Floyd Palmer, Jr. I love and he is always sooooo funny, he cracks me up.  Some new people, like son...I did not like much...but the play is good and it always have a teaching spiritual theme.
Funny!  I saw this play in person before ordering the dvd.  Hats off to Tyler Perry.  He did not let me down.  I enjoyed the play in person and have enjoyed watching it again on dvd.  Thanks Tyler.
I love Tyler Perry's new character Hattie. Now she reminds me of my Grandmother.  Big ups Tyler, I can't wait to see what characters you produce in the future.
Tyler Perry does it again in this awesome play. :) I highly recommend it whether you are a fan or not!!!

I WOULD LIKE TO THANK AMAZON FOR THEIR AWESOME AND PROMPT SERVICE. THIS DELIVERY WAS ON TIME AS WAS PROMISED. THE PLAY WAS EVERY THING I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE; FUNNY BUT WITH SERIOUS FAMILY VALUES AND CHRISTIAN BASED AS WELL.

This is a story about genuine life.  I would have to say that it feels like this was written by a man who knows what it must like to be very rich and bribe male workers for intimacy in order to keep their jobs in his estate.

That's what Taylor Perrys is about people! He has an ear for how real folks speak dialogue and a he has a mouth that is one of the prettiest I've seen in ages. If my boyfriend, Santiago, would just agree to let our relationship be a bit more open we would most assuredly send an evite to Mr. Perrys this instant!

Not one of my favorite Tyler Perry plays.  Sometimes he gets a few laughs from a certain character then rams the person down your throat.  That woman with the scratchy voice gets on my nerves.  Time for him to find someone else to be the headliner.

This play was one of Tyler Perry's best, although all of his plays are great. You can see how he has grown since the beginning. Mr. Perry is brilliant in all forms of media to the stage to the screen and even in the songs he writes. I enjoy all of his work, I applaud you!
very funny hattie is the girl i love her other show love thou neigbor she is a great actor hope to see her in more plays and shows
No less than what I expected from one of Tyler Perry's plays. The actors were superb, the songs, written by Tyler, were wonderful. I enjoyed the play very much. Laughed until I cried.
Theses two together, Aunt Hattie and Floyd are two people that will keep you in stitches.  Always have the faith everything can and will work out.

i enjoyed the dvd alot, I've watched it a few times with friends and family. What a way to bring family and friends together, with alot of laughter and enjoyment. I would recommend this dvd, for who ever wants to watch it, and laugh just as much as i did.

this movie was a gift for my mother, to be honest I don't think it went over well with her, the little I saw  did very little as for entertainment, it's as if TP's plays are becoming long and drawn out with the same messeagges

This play was "halarious", but very serious in retrospect to reality. It entailed every encounter/hardship we as human beings face everyday. Tyler Perry's: plays, movies, and tv shows are always encouraging, teaching, funny, and down right good like eating soul food!!!!!! I really enjoyed this one, and only gave  4 stars because I was looking for more actors/actresses; and more scenarios of other hardships.

Tyler Perry is a genius, this movie had me laughing my head off, when I showed it to some of my friends, we had a crazy good time, The actors are also so talented, if It wasn't for Tyler we would never see or hear these folks,  He seems to give the un-knowns a chance.  Tyler BLESS-UP.
I enjoyed it very much.  I just about all of Tyler Perry's plays and movies.  I would definitely tell others to watch it.
I much prefer the Tyler Perry movies over the plays. Still well done with a good message. ItL was interesting to see where he got Ms. Hattie from now on OWN's "Love thy Neighbor.

Tyler Perry is a excellent writer! Funny but still gives a great message. Keep up the good work and I can't wait for the next one.

tyler perry what can I say I have bought every play and movie what is it that you can not do this was a awesome play I am glad to see amazon sell your movies I get them fast and can preorder I love the price you sell your movies where I can afford it I AM YOUR NUMBER ONE FAN  thank you for making me laugh and also I am glad to see you using palmer jr. he is so funnyand the woman is hilarious good job tyler perry

Floyd and Mama Hattie were really funny but outside of, that, it was just ooooook.  There were a few really good and moving songs but I'm about to be over these stage plays I do believe.  Too much of a good thing can become a played out thing....
this movie was hilarious I just love these two when they are together I could watch this over and over again

Tyler Perry has done it again, I really enjoyed the play.  He took a very serious storyline and once again, showed us how one act can change more than one person,  and by doing what is right and  communication  can clear up a lot of misunderstandings.  The bottom line is that no one is perfect and we continue to struggle with those temptations daily.  Mama Hattie is too funny.
It ok,  so parts are funny and relational, but others seem kind of boring.  Hattie is the best on their and her and floyd really make the show.
